title: BRIEF-‍Acxiom To Explore Options For Marketing Solutions Business​
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Acxiom Corp:
* ACXIOM REALIGNS PORTFOLIO TO DRIVE LONG-TERM SUCCESS * ACXIOM CORP - ‍EXPECTS TO REPORT ITS RESULTS UNDER REALIGNED BUSINESS UNITS IN Q1 OF FISCAL 2019​
* ACXIOM CORP - ‍ACXIOM TO EXPLORE OPTIONS FOR MARKETING SOLUTIONS BUSINESS​
* ACXIOM - MARKETING SOLUTIONS BUSINESS​ ‍OPTIONS MAY INCLUDE ACQUISITION, TAX-FREE MERGER, JV, SPIN-OFF, SALE, OTHER POTENTIAL STRATEGIC COMBINATIONS
* ACXIOM CORP - ‍CONSOLIDATES ALL IDENTITY ASSETS INTO LIVERAMP​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
